Messages.Author: Martin Sebastian Haase
Messages.Content: Dear students, the lecture on Monday, February 8th 2024, will take place online (asynchronously). Please complete the following task. Open the ISIS-course - chapter "Preparation of the exam (July 08th 2024)". You have to alternatives. 1) You can watch the screencasts, which are uploaded in the video collection "Creating a legal assessment of a case". In sc 1 I read a typical task of the exams in data protection law. In sc 2, 4, ... I read the facts of the case and the questions from original exams that have taken place in the past. In sc 3, 5, ... I explain the solution and the relevant aspects.  Alternatively, you can download the documents (exams), read the facts of the cases and questions on your own, write down your legal opinion and just watch the screencasts in which I explain the solution and the relevant aspects. Kind regards Martin S. Haase

Messages.Author: Martin Sebastian Haase
Messages.Content: Dear students.  Next week (08.07.2023) the lecture will take place online (asynchronously) (i.e. not in presence).  Kind regards  M. Haase

Messages.Author: Martin Sebastian Haase
Messages.Content: Dear students, I have just uploaded the slides for today's lecture in the ISIS course: https://isis.tu-berlin.de/pluginfile.php/3241267/mod_resource/content/0/Facebook%20Customer%20Audience%2020210615.pdf Up-to-date information on customer lists is available at https://en-gb.facebook.com/business/help/170456843145568?id=2469097953376494&locale=en_GB Thank you very much for the great discussions! Kind regards M. Haase

Messages.Author: Martin Sebastian Haase
Messages.Content: Today, the lecture takes Place in H 5105.

Messages.Author: Martin Sebastian Haase
Messages.Content: Dear students, today wie will discuss the case „Google Spain“. Please, read the facts of the case. Answer the questions: 1. Is the scope given? 2. Who is controller/processor? 3. Is the principle of lawfulness fullfilled? Kind regards M. Haase

Messages.Author: Selin Güven
Messages.Content: Hi,   Where can I find the link to today's lecture?  Thanks in advance

Messages.Author: Milan Joshua Zetzsche
Messages.Content: Hello fellow students,  for family reasons I have not been able to attend the lectures live so far. Could someone send me their notes, especially for the case studies? That would be super nice! I can then return the favor with my learning script, but I'm only writing in the second period.  Best, Milan
